comment: Fisher simulation on the thick half annulus fine.

boundary_D: lambda x, on_boundary : on_boundary and (abs(x[0]*x[0] + x[1]*x[1] - 0.5*0.5) < {0})
lambda x, on_boundary : on_boundary and (abs(x[0]) < 0.000001) and (x[1] > {0})
lambda x, on_boundary : on_boundary and (abs(x[0]*x[0] + x[1]*x[1] - 1.5*1.5) < {0})
lambda x, on_boundary: on_boundary and ((abs(x[1] - {0}) < 0.000001) and x[0] - 0.000001 < 0)
